server

Class ServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.ServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ClientState

    public class ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ClientState
    Thread to handle individual requests from a client.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Thread receives strings from the client, processes them and returns result back to the client. Each client connection is assigned a unique identifier by which one can reference it in the future. If protocol is violated, then immediately close connection to client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(Message m)
